name: overflight
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an occasion when an aircraft flies over a place: Residents campaigned to reduce airline overflights in the area. An overflight after the hurricane revealed a shocking level of damage.
More examplesFewer examplesThey would need permission for military overflights in the country's airspace.Police search helicopters conducted overflights.The government has condemned the overflights as illegal.They granted overflight rights to US planes en route to Central Asian bases.
